vsim.assembler

Class Assembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • vsim.assembler.Assembler

  • public final class Assembler
extends java.lang.Object
    The Assembler class contains useful methods to assemble RISC-V source files.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DebugInfo debug
      current assembler debug info
      static Program program
      current assembler program
      protected static Segment segment
      current assembler segment

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Program> assemble(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files)
      This method is used to assemble all the RISC-V files and it is called before the linkage process.
      static void error(java.lang.String msg)
      This method is an alias for error(java.lang.String, boolean) that sets to true the parameter showSource.
      static void error(java.lang.String msg, boolean showSource)
      This method is used to create a pretty formatted error and adds this error to the error list Globals.errors.
      protected static boolean inBssSegment()
      This method checks if the current assembler segment is the bss segment.
      protected static boolean inDataSegment()
      This method checks if the current assembler segment is the data segment.
      protected static boolean inRodataSegment()
      This method checks if the current assembler segment is the rodata segment.
      protected static boolean inTextSegment()
      This method checks if the current assembler segment is the text segment.
      static void warning(java.lang.String msg)
      This method is used to pretty print a warning.

    • Method Detail

      • inTextSegment

        protected static boolean inTextSegment()
        This method checks if the current assembler segment is the text segment.
        Returns:
        true if the text segment is the current segment, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Segment

      • inDataSegment

        protected static boolean inDataSegment()
        This method checks if the current assembler segment is the data segment.
        Returns:
        true if the data segment is the current segment, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Segment

      • error

        public static void error(java.lang.String msg,
                         boolean showSource)
        This method is used to create a pretty formatted error and adds this error to the error list Globals.errors.
        Parameters:
        msg - the error message
        showSource - true if you want to show the source line
        See Also:
        Globals.errors

      • error

        public static void error(java.lang.String msg)
        This method is an alias for error(java.lang.String, boolean) that sets to true the parameter showSource.
        Parameters:
        msg - the error message
        See Also:
        error(java.lang.String, boolean)

      • warning

        public static void warning(java.lang.String msg)
        This method is used to pretty print a warning.
        Parameters:
        msg - the warning message

      • assemble

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Program> assemble(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files)
        This method is used to assemble all the RISC-V files and it is called before the linkage process.
        Parameters:
        files - the RISC-V files to assemble
        Returns:
        all the assembled files
        See Also:
        Program
